Question
========
  
The income of professional football players follows a right skewed distribution. Which of the following statements is correct? 
Answerlist
----------
* The majority of professional football players earn less than the median.
* The majority of professional football players earn more than the median.
* The majority of professional football players earn less than the median.
* The majority of professional football players earn more than the average.
